name: 皮德思教育哲學
description: 本課程藉由當代分析哲學之發展史的探索，以理解皮德思教育思想的哲學背景，並據以深入分析皮德思教育哲學的建構邏輯，進而掌握《倫理與教育》的理論要旨，期能激發研究教育哲學的能力、興趣及靈感。
goals: 綜觀當代教育分析哲學發展史
激發研究教育哲學的能力及興趣
熟悉教育思想的分析方法
掌握倫理與教育的密切關係
syllabus:
**1\.** Philosophical background  (B4)                                      

**2\.** Philosophy of education: The evolution of a discipline  (B2, 1-22)                                               

3\. Introduction & Criteria of education（Ⅰ）(B1, 7-30)                                               

4\. Criteria of education（Ⅱ）(B1, 30-45)                                              

5\. Education as initiation     (B1, 46-62)                                               

6\. Spring Holiday                                                                                         

8\. Classical theories of justification   (B1, 91-116)                                                      

9\. Equality    (B1, 117-143)                                          

10\. Worthwhile activities (B1, 144-166)                                             

11\. The consideration of interests (B1, 167-178)                                            

12\. Freedom (B1, 179-207)                                             

13\. Respect for persons, fraternity and the concept of man ( B1, 208-236)                                         

14\. Authority and education (B1, 237-265)                                             

15\. Punishment and displine (B1, 266-290)                                            

16\. Democracy and education (B1，291-319)                                             

17\. Final report

18\. Final report
